original: Hey Kids, want to know about Kredit?
translated: 孩子们，儿童信用卡了解一下？

original: It's the Kredit Kard for Kids!
translated: 为孩子们量身打造的信用卡！

original: Did your parents tell you that you need a job or an income or a specific ethnicity to get a credit card?  Well they're still living in the Stoned Age (trust us, you'll get to it in Third Grade)!
translated: 父母是不是跟你说，没有工作和收入，种族不好，就批不了信用卡？他们还活在石器时代(三年级的知识点，真的)呢！

original: Bank of Liberty is pleased to announce the Piggy Bank Card!  Available with pictures of your favorite cartoon characters copulating with an ATM, this card offers the under-12s a taste of what life can be like when you get your bill and shit your pants.
translated: 自由城银行隆重推出小猪银行卡！不仅在卡面上印有你最喜欢的卡通人物与ATM交互的图案，这张卡还会丰富12岁以下儿童的生活经验，品尝收到账单后吓出屎的滋味。

original: Enjoy a teaser rate of just 5% per week and a credit limit of $1000.  But all you need to know is: that's a lot of candy!  And now you can buy candy and worry about the bill or diabetes later.
translated: 享受5%/周的优惠利率和$1000的信用额度吧。你只需要知道：能买好多糖诶！这下可以大把吃糖了，账单和肥胖的事之后再说。

original: Don't be a laughing stock in recess with last month's sneakers.  Just pick up a form from one of our clown sales reps outside the school gate or in your local shopping mall and ask the janitor to act as co-signer.
translated: 穿着上个月的旧款运动鞋，不怕下课被人笑话吗？去校门口或者商场里找我们的小丑业务员要张表，拉个清洁工替父母签字，你就能得到儿童信用卡啦！

original: The interest rate will rise to 25% in the second month.  Grace periods will be changed when you least expect it.
translated: 办卡次月的利率会恢复到25%。宽限期会在你最不希望缩短的时候调整。
